parameters: I don't have time for this.
There's some trash from our meals in here.
The stove is wiped down spotless.
I'm hungry, but I gotta ask Lee what he wants first.
\|I guess I don't HAVE to, but I want to.
I'm hungry, but I wanna ask Lee what he wants first.
I'll torrent that documentary series we were watching when I get home if I can find it.
Well, barely. It's a little past noon.
You slept for \|fourteen hours. \.How are you?
And I got the phone charger as well.
Okay. Give me one minute. Then I'll make us breakfast.
[I should get up and get myself together.]
[My phone's charging. The battery's so low, the screen won't turn on.]
I'm REALLY hungry… let's see what's in the fridge.
To be honest, if I did start walking, I wouldn't even know which way to go.
Still zero reception. It could just be my carrier, I guess.
I’ve been complaining about the internet, but maybe I gave up on fixing it too quickly.
I should take another look at it.
It was out in the garage.
I'll just leave the phone charger here. My battery's full.
I scolded Lee for running a hot pan under cold water. He refuses to leave any dishes on the counter.
These knives are all right, but they need a good sharpening.
Lee was running them through the dishwasher. What a waste.
No... the flashlight wasn't in these drawers.
The flashlight definitely wasn't in either bathroom.
We never ran the dishwasher. Lee just washes things by hand immediately.
Blue leather couch. It's nice and big.
The couch is pretty comfy, but not as comfy as the bed.
There's only one console, and it's from the 90s.
Maybe I should introduce him to the world of romhacks.
